name: Painkiller: Black Edition

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer(EXE file).

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer(EXE file).
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Painkiller/Bin/Painkiller.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: winemenubuilder.exe
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: ''
- task:
    args: /NOCANCEL '/DIR=C:/Painkiller'
    description: Installing...
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: sandbox
    description: Disabling unused WINE features
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
